reapack.name: Sonorityscape_Misc_EQPracticeWithReaEQ.lua
reapack.desc: EQ Practice With ReaEQ - Test your EQ skills with any combination of randomized frequencies, gain levels and bandwidth settings

version.author: Daniel Petras
version.changelog: 1.1 ReaEQ can be inserted into any FX slot position ReaEQ will now be instantiated onto the first selected track The 'gain' in User Settings can be left blank. It will default to 0dB If the 'bandwidth is left blank, it will default to 1 If you remove all frequencies from the User Settings the script will prompt user to add at least one 'user_input' and 'reset_filter' can be set to false instead of previously having to comment them out
